SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.objectives

Class ObjectiveCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.objectives.ObjectiveCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ObjectiveCard extends Card implements Serializable
Represents the cards that give points to the player once the game is over, considering if and how many times the objective shown on the card is completed.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectiveCard

      public ObjectiveCard(int id, int points, ObjectivePointsStrategy pointsStrategy)
      Constructs a new ObjectiveCard object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the card
      points - The amount of points given to the player assuming the objective shown on the card is accomplished a single time.
      pointsStrategy - object used to call the strategy design pattern

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Calculates the total amount of points given to the player, considering the number of times the objective shown on the card is accomplished.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the whole player board, containing all the already placed cards
      Returns:
      the total points the player gets

    • getPoints
